disease.name: Cystic Fibrosis
disease.description: Characterized by impaired lung and digestive function due to thick, sticky mucus. The disease typically worsens over time and currently has no cure.

disease.name: Usher Syndrome Type 1 (USH1)
disease.description: Presents with complete hearing loss from birth, problems with balance and progressive loss of sight starting before puberty.

disease.name: GJB2 Related hearing loss
disease.description: Hearing loss that varies from mild to profound, is typically present at birth, and does not worsen over time.
